title: Testing stderr
description: A testing config for feedback and tests that incorporate stderr.
instructions:
Check the feedback on run for stderr feedback.

Test the code for the stderr case.

feedback.title: Oh no, an error!
feedback.message:
I hope you read the error message.
What does it mean?

feedback.title: Hidden: Oh no, an error!
feedback.message:
Oh no an error!
I hope you read the message.

feedback.title: This test should not trigger.
feedback.message: So I guess this is a thing?

ungrouped.description: Checked that an error was raised.
ungrouped.failureMessage: Well, we got an error. Now what?
